/usr/bin/g++     -lGL  -lGLU  -lglut -lGLEW  -std=c++14 -g  -pthread   -L /lib64  -Os -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/scrInteractor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/TrackBall.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/polarDecomposition.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/mat3d.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/eig3.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/vec3d.cpp.o  -o mpm_3d -rdynamic -lGLU -lGL -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lpthread
